items.creator: AP
items.title: Alphabet to buy cybersecurity startup Wiz for $32 billion
items.dc:creator: AP
items.content: Wiz makes security tools designed to shield the information stored in remote data centers from intruders. If closed, the transaction will become Google's most expensive acquisition ever.
items.contentSnippet: Wiz makes security tools designed to shield the information stored in remote data centers from intruders. If closed, the transaction will become Google's most expensive acquisition ever.

items.title: Trump says his administration is set to release JFK files with no redactions
